free_txt: G.C.

bib_record.title: -THE DETERMINATION OF THE FAST FISSION CROSS SECTION OF PROTOACTINIUM-233 WITH FISSION NEUTRONS.-

free_txt: RESEARCH REACTOR IN WUERENLINGEN,
(EIR), THERMAL REACTOR, 20 MW TH, RADIAL BEAM HOLE.
.CORRECTIONS FOR BACKGROUND, COUNTER EFFICIENCY, FLUX
VARIATIONS, HALF LIFE OF PA-233 (27.0 DAYS), SELF-
ABSORPTION OF FISSION FRAGMENTS IN THE SAMPLES, AND
THRESHOLD.
DOUBLE (BACK-TO-BACK) PARALLEL PLATE TYPE
FISSION CHAMBER (ALUMINIUM) OPERATED AS A GAS FLOW
CHAMBER WITH AN ARGON(99 PC)-METHANE MIXTURE AT 1 ATM
PRESSURE. THE FIRST COUNTER CONTAINS ALTERNATIVELY
SAMPLES OF PA-233, TH-232, U-235, AND PA-233/U-235-
MIXTURES. THE SECOND COUNTER SERVES AS FAST NEUTRON
FLUX MONITOR AND CONTAINS UNIFORMLY PLATED DEPOSITS
ON ITS TWO CATHODES OF 4.47 RESP. 5.10 MG TH-O(2),
DIA 40 MM. THE CHAMBER IS SURROUNDED BY A SHIELDING
OF 100 MM LEAD AND 0.3 MM CADMIUM.
.A DETAILED ERROR-ANALYSIS IS GIVEN. DATA CONTAIN THE
TOTAL ABSOLUTE ERROR.
RESEARCH REACTOR IN WUERENLINGEN,
(EIR), THERMAL REACTOR, 20 MW TH, RADIAL BEAM HOLE.
.U-233 TARGET AS NEUTRON FLUX CONVERTER.
.FISSION NEUTRON SPECTRUM.
.MEASUREMENT OF THE FAST FISSION CROSS SECTION OF
PA-233 BY COMPARING THE FISSION RATE OF A KNOWN
QUANTITY OF PA-233 TO THAT OF A KNOWN TH-SAMPLE,
USING BACK-TO-BACK FISSION COUNTERS.
.PRODUCTION OF PA-233 BY IRRADIATION OF THORIUM METAL
CHIPS IN THE REACTOR AND SUBSEQUENT CHEMICAL SEPARA-
TION. THE TARGET CONSISTS OF A 20 MM DIAM CYLINDER
FILLED WITH 10 G OF U-233 (AS U(3)-O(8)) AND IS
PLACED DIRECTLY IN FRONT OF THE COUNTERS. THE U-233
SERVES AS CONVERTER FOR THE NEUTRON FLUX AS WELL AS
ABSORBER FOR U-233 RESONANCE NEUTRONS. A 0.6 MM THICK
CADMIUM SHEET BEHIND THE CONVERTER SERVES AS
SHIELDING AGAINST THERMAL NEUTRONS.
.PA-233 LAYERS ON PLATINUM DISKS, VARIOUS QUANTITIES
FROM 0.20 TO 1.76 CI (1 CI = 48 MICROGRAMS), DIAM
15 MM. FOR THE ABSOLUTE FLUX MEASUREMENTS THIN
THORIUM SAMPLES WERE USED (SAME GEOMETRY). THE
DETERMINATION OF THE COUNTER EFFICIENCY WAS CARRIED
OUT WITH U-235 AND (PA-233 + U-235)-MIXTURES, USING
AN U-235 STANDARD SOLUTION FOR PREPARATION.
DATA TAKEN FROM NEUDADA.
.THE INTERFERENCE OF THE BETA BACKGROUND FROM PA-233
WAS ELIMINATED BY APPLYING HIGH ISCRIMINATION AND AN
APPROPRIATE CORRECTION FOR THE COUNTER EFFICIENCY AT
ZERO BIAS.
DATA TAKEN FROM NEUDADA.
